notification.title: Styx: Behind the Scenes
notification.note: So, this version now offers a new remote ticker notification system. So I can talk to you on demand! ;-)
notification.author: Ian Styx

notification.title: Styx 4.3 is going beta
notification.note: To avoid conflicts with development (versions) of next major Styx 5 series with new system requirements within the next few months, some logical changes have already been applied to divide series 4 and 5 versions apart. This also was necessary for Spartacus access to "additional plugins", which for the current series has moved to another branch on GitHub, called "legacy". Please watch out for eventually raised, related "Remote System Notification" issues in your blogs backend.
notification.author: Ian Styx
